hero.title:
Your Words.
Your Privacy.
Your Control.
hero.subtitle: LocalWrite is a privacy-first AI writing assistant that runs 100% on your device. Enhance your writing with powerful AI - without sending a single word to the cloud. Free forever. Open source. No compromises.

manifesto.block1_p1: Every AI writing tool today sends your words to corporate servers. Your drafts, your ideas, your private thoughts - all uploaded, stored, and potentially used to train AI models. Writers, journalists, and professionals are forced to choose between AI assistance and privacy.
manifesto.block1_p2: This isn't just inconvenient. It's a fundamental breach of creative privacy. Your words should belong to you.
manifesto.belief1_desc: Your drafts, notes, and ideas deserve the same privacy as your spoken conversations. AI assistance shouldn't require surveillance.
manifesto.belief2_desc: Powerful writing tools shouldn't cost $20-50/month. Students, indie authors, and small businesses deserve the same AI capabilities as big corporations.
manifesto.belief3_desc: Modern devices are powerful enough to run sophisticated AI locally. Cloud dependency is a business model, not a technical necessity.
manifesto.belief4_desc: You shouldn't have to take our word for it. Every line of code is public. Audit it. Verify our privacy claims yourself.
manifesto.commitment1_desc: LocalWrite will always be free. No trials. No feature walls. No "freemium" tricks. Full functionality for everyone.
manifesto.commitment2_desc: Your writing never leaves your device. No telemetry. No analytics. No exceptions. We literally cannot see what you write.
manifesto.commitment3_desc: MIT licensed. Fork it. Modify it. Build on it. The mission is bigger than any single project.

impact.title: This Is What We're Building
impact.stat1_desc: Zero bytes sent to external servers. Ever.
impact.stat3_desc: From professional to creative to concise.
impact.stat4_desc: No usage limits. No API caps. Unlimited.

product.title:
LocalWrite:
AI Writing That Respects You
product.subtitle: A powerful writing enhancement tool that runs entirely on your machine. No cloud required.
product.feature1_desc: Professional, Creative, Academic, Conversational, Concise, Elaborate, and more. Transform your text to match any style or audience.
product.feature2_desc: Fine-tune the AI's creativity with a simple slider. Conservative for business writing, expressive for creative work.
product.feature3_desc: Enhance entire PDF documents while preserving formatting. Perfect for reports, essays, and professional documents.
product.feature4_desc: Word count, sentence count, reading time, grade level, and tone analysis. Know your writing inside and out.
product.feature5_desc: Choose from 5 curated AI models. Qwen, Llama, Gemma, Mistral - pick the best for your writing style.
